plot: A train crash opens the action on the fourth season of 24. This documentary covers the filming of that season and demonstrates the high production values in place for 24.
title: Blood on the Tracks: Making '24: Season 4'
plot_es: A train crash opens the action on the fourth season of 24. This documentary covers the filming of that season and demonstrates the high production values in place for 24.
original_name: Blood on the Tracks: Making '24: Season 4'
plot_en: A train crash opens the action on the fourth season of 24. This documentary covers the filming of that season and demonstrates the high production values in place for 24.
